name: Reality Janitor
description:
You are the reality janitor, it is your job to clean up this broken reality.

Controls:

WASD to Move

Right Mouse Button to Swing

E to Interact

Escape for Menu and Manual Respawn (in-case of getting stuck)

Nick, Xander, and Zachary brought this UE4 MegaJam project to life.

With help from:

Soundly

Low Poly Adventure Pack

Low Poly City Pack

Colossal Game Music Collection

Paragon Sevarog

https://opengameart.org/content/filthy

https://opengameart.org/content/bleu
